choose.when: insert into board ( title, content, reg_date, hit, group_no, order_no, depth, users_no ) values ( #{title}, #{content}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, 0, ifnull( ( select max(b.group_no) from board b ), 0) + 1, 1, 0, #{userNo} )
choose.otherwise: insert into board ( title, content, reg_date, hit, group_no, order_no, depth, users_no ) values ( #{title}, #{content}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, 0, #{groupNo}, #{orderNo}, #{depth}, #{userNo} )

select count(*) from board
where title like '%#{keyword}%' or content like '%#{keyword}%'

choose.when: select y.* from ( select x.no, x.title, x.hit, x.reg_date as regDate, x.depth, x.name as userName, x.users_no as userNo, (@rownum := @rownum + 1) as rn from ( select b.no, b.title, b.hit, b.reg_date, b.depth, u.name, b.users_no from board b, users u where b.users_no = u.no and (b.title like '%#{keyword}%' or b.content like '%#{keyword}%') order by group_no desc, order_no asc ) x, ( select @rownum := 0 ) r ) y where (#{page}-1)*#{size}+1 <= rn and rn <= #{page}*#{size}
choose.otherwise: select y.* from ( select x.no, x.title, x.hit, x.reg_date as regDate, x.depth, x.name as userName, x.users_no as userNo, (@rownum := @rownum + 1) as rn from ( select b.no, b.title, b.hit, b.reg_date, b.depth, u.name, b.users_no from board b, users u where b.users_no = u.no order by group_no desc, order_no asc ) x, ( select @rownum := 0 ) r ) y where (#{page}-1)*#{size}+1 <= rn and rn <= #{page}*#{size}

mapper.select: select no, title, content, group_no as groupNo, order_no as orderNo, depth, users_no as userNo from board where no=#{no}
